definition: Office of the UN High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Nan2 min2 Shi4 wu4 Gao1 ji2 Zhuan1 yuan2 Ban4 shi4 chu4
containing_words.word: 聯合國難民事務高級專員辦事處

sentences.english: Beaverton's % Mayor Doyle wants refugee and immigrant leaders to participate in the town's decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 比弗頓市長道爾希望難民和移民領袖參與本市的決策。

sentences.english: There's an area called Yida where many of these refugees have settled.
sentences.chinese: 許多難民在玉達這一區域定居。

sentences.english: China would likely respond by mobilizing the Shenyang Military Region forces and could send forces into North Korea to control refugee flow.
sentences.chinese: 中國可能出動瀋陽軍區的部隊進入朝鮮以控制難民潮。

sentences.english: Refugees from Messina were relocated to cities throughout Italy.
sentences.chinese: 墨西拿難民被重新安置在意大利境內其它城市。

sentences.english: Refugees have been deprived of their homes, but they must not be deprived of their futures.
sentences.chinese: 難民的家園已被剝奪，絕不能讓他們的未來也被剝奪。

sentences.english: Witnesses said the bomb hit the refugees as they were sheltering under trees and bushes.
sentences.chinese: 目擊者稱，難民在樹林和樹叢中避難時遭到炸彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Drivers say migrants and people trafficking gangs have attacked their vehicles with metal bars.
sentences.chinese: 司機們稱難民和偷渡團伙用金屬桿襲擊過他們的車。

sentences.english: The sad condition of these refugees would move a heart of stone to sympathy。
sentences.chinese: 這些難民的悲慘處境能使一個鐵石心腸動容。

sentences.english: The masterminds of the prospiracy to help the refugees escape were themselves former refugees.
sentences.chinese: 難民逃脫計劃的策劃人自己本身之前就是難民。

sentences.english: The masterminds of the prospiracy to help the refugees escape were themselves former refugees.
sentences.chinese: 難民逃脫計劃的策劃人自己本身之前就是難民。

sentences.english: The CAS has been involved in refugee management since 1975.
sentences.chinese: 民安隊自一九七五年便參與管理難民的工作。

sentences.english: There was a stream of refugees trudging up the valley towards the border.
sentences.chinese: 一隊難民步履艱難地爬上山谷向着邊境走去。

sentences.english: He and his family had been living in a refugee camp in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 他和家人此前一直生活在肯尼亞一個難民營中。

sentences.english: They parcelled out the food for the refugees.
She spoke at length about the plight of the refugees.
sentences.chinese: 她詳細地講述了難民們的悲慘境遇。

sentences.english: The Red Cross dispensed charity to refugees.
